alert.note: Alert for Douglas; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Douglas and southwestern Fulton Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Chapel Hill, or near Douglasville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Fairburn, Lithia Springs, Sweetwater Creek State Park, Campbellton, Chapel Hill, and Bill Arp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
